ygData.subject: XML/XHTML analogy
ygData.msgSnippet: I was trying to draw a protocol analogy to XML/XHTML.  The best I could come up with was; XML is to XHTML as HTTP is to Yahoo. MB -- Mark Baker, CTO, Idokorro

I was trying to draw a protocol analogy to XML/XHTML.  The best I could
come up with was;

XML is to XHTML as HTTP is to Yahoo.

MB
